item.title: Vim
item.description: Vim Vim Table of Contents Folding Folding Table 1. Vim folding commands Command Explanation zf#j creates a fold from the cursor down # lines. zf/ string creates a fold from the cursor to string. zj moves the cursor to the next fold. zk moves the cursor to the previous fold.
